biocontainers.name: msisensor
biocontainers.summary: MSIsensor is a C++ program to detect replication slippage variants at microsatellite regions, and differentiate them as somatic or germline.

biotools.summary: C++ program for automatically detecting somatic and germline variants at microsatellite regions. It computes length distributions of microsatellites per site in paired tumor and normal sequence data, subsequently using these to statistically compare observed distributions in both samples.

bioschemas.name: MSIsensor
bioschemas.summary: C++ program for automatically detecting somatic and germline variants at microsatellite regions. It computes length distributions of microsatellites per site in paired tumor and normal sequence data, subsequently using these to statistically compare observed distributions in both samples.
